documents.document: @emiledonovan @LauraTupou @Puriripark You're not just a pretty face then, Emily... I mean Emile :P hahaha

Thank goodness everyone is OK. https://t.co/6WxWbwb989

When you get to spend your work day out of the office and in the forest instead. https://t.co/WbnesAbMLV
@TracyJNeal This has actually made my day! I laughed so hard at that genius intro that Paul thought I was up to no good :P
Anyone out there an expert in bird puns? I'm having trouble writing an intro about a Kiwi sanctuary and am in need of some pzazz :P
Anyone would think I knew something about rugby.... Fake it until you make it https://t.co/WoIoUv4W2c
Late night baking for the news team tomorrow. Nutella cheesecake = delicious. #baking #tasty https://t.co/DJqR4clOM9

When your colleagues burst into song in the newsroom, singing Beauty and the Beast. There are no words.... #shiftwork #lovemyworkmates
@AnushaBradley Thanks Anusha, certainly teaching me to think on my feet! P.s you've been doing such a great job on Summer Report :)

@ethan_tucker Jane Seymour was possibly the dullest of all his wives, and yet he chose to be buried next to her!
I'm all about Team Boleyn! #History #geeks #lovemyjob https://t.co/cJmRttoeSF

@M_Cropp @GeorgeKCampbell Yes don't move so far away, come live with us Mrs Potter :) We can feed you well!!

Breaking: A large scrub fire is threatening homes in Wither Hills, Blenheim. Police are asking residents to prepare for possible evacuations
"We aren't heroes. We're just Kiwis doing what Kiwis do best, helping their brothers." https://t.co/B0uT1rL9kC'
@PuaMagasiva Hi Pua,I understand you helped rescue a man trapped in a car yesterday. Would you be free for quick interview about it? Thanks!
@rarahsobson Cameramen are the guardian angels in the news world! One once gave me a jacket when I wore I singlet to court&wasn't allowed in
The police reveal they were forced to used tear gas to arrest a man who was armed with a crossbow in Taranaki. https://t.co/LidC12KgiV
It's a raging Saturday at the @M_Cropp and @Adriana_Weber_ flat today... we're both having a nap at 4 in the afternoon. #shiftwork #journos
@RiJac01 You're right, Geonet says mag 5, certainly made me jump.
Wellington, can you please stop shaking? #eqnz #wellington #weeshake
I'm getting teary again, what an adorable wee story!! https://t.co/3iuWCKaDwo
Well that was quite a shake! Way to ruin a rather nice Ryan Gosling filled dream, earthquake. #quake #wellington

When you start bawling your eyes out in the middle of the movie theatre whilst watching #lalaland . #suckerforromance
A beautiful collection of photos from my incredibly talented former colleague Ben Fraser @TheDailyPost https://t.co/wKf5t2aYAs
@bopmafia Yes from Rotorua, which according to @MetService is currently graced with temps of 21 degrees and fine spells.
@bopmafia That's nuts. Times like this I wish I was back in the sunny Bay of Plenty!
It appears it was the wrong day to wear a summer dress to work..... #imgonnafreeze #wellingtonsummer https://t.co/0lT69TSz6n

@rarahsobson I get that one too! Putting it down to the festive season, perhaps they're all too tipsy and can't read a name as a result :P
When you get called Ariana, Andriana, Andrina, Andrea and Angelina in various work related emails over the past week...#lifeofajournalist

@kennykatie Yeah I think for most people it's a third, mines about a third, but that's just rent not including any expenses or other bills!
@kennykatie Part of me crys every time I see the rent deducted from my pay every fortnight. It crushes me every time!
"Others in the Fire Service who end up in the same situation as I.. would not have to endure what I went through." https://t.co/r81d5oTzyd

@MaxBentleyTowle I'm sorry I should have known better, for a moment I forgot the world revolved around you :P There will be cake tomorrow 2

Anyone in Wellington stocking up on emergency supplies following last week's quake? RNZ would like to speak to you. Please get in touch
@M_Cropp you're missing out on scotch in the newsroom... :P Worst day ever to not be here :P
.. @OHnewsroom "Alcohol, I'm just running towards the alcohol." After this week, I think that's a valid thing to say on a Thursday :P
Cute puppies are the answer to everything right now. https://t.co/i5K6ASdM8W
Wellington hit with more bad weather it seems, drive safe everyone! #wellington #weatherwoes https://t.co/BT69WBmPPk
@TracyJNeal It definitely looks like it could be a house pet.. I wonder if @M_Cropp will let me bring a pet lamb home to our flat :)
This makes any shiftworker's night so much better :) Keep up the great work @geonet #longnights #shiftworkstories https://t.co/6BxdjC3mSo
"She'll be right, got enough gas and enough smokes to keep me going" love how Wellingtonians are so laid back about being stuck in traffic.
Thank you to the very nice officer from @nzpolice who made sure I was safe interviewing people stuck in traffic in #Wellington tonight.
When your co-worker is doing a live cross with Australian media and it starts shaking, had to try really hard not to yell bad words..
Sitting in the newsroom and the building starts to sway again... a little scary... #Aftershock #quakes #wellington
Very blessed to work with such hardworking journos and staff - some very long hours put in the RNZ newsroom. https://t.co/5pAJclOGUv
@TracyJNeal @chloewinternz I bet it must've been even scarier down there and in cchurch! Glad you're ok Tracy
And yet another aftershock, currently sheltering in the doorway with @chloewinternz trying to stop our hands shaking and stay calm.
@DeanJBedford Thanks Dean, hope you're ok too. Terrifying being in a three storey building.
Another massive aftershock here in central Wellington, still feels like it's rolling. Sirens going off, things falling off shelves. @rnznews
That was terrifying!!!! Hope everyone is safe and OK, feeling the aftershocks rattling through still. Please stay safe.
@kimbakerwilson I had the same thought when I found I had written country without the o about five times in one story.. opps, Fridays..
Just answered the phone at work to hear Adele's 'Hello' being played down the phone line.... yes to being prank called at work. #funfridays
